name: Dicezilla
description:
Dicezilla attacks !

Defend the city with your mecha and your super card-weapon!

First choose a card and then pay it with dice. There is 4 type of dice (d4,d6,d8,d10) and you can attack, defend, heal yourself and much more!

But warning, you only know the type of dice and not its result when you pay with it.

So play strategically and use the different dice in a good way!

Made by 1 person for GMTKJAM 2022

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Tutorial :


1-Pick a card with the help of card description by clicking on it with your mouse

2-Pay each [  ] in the description with a dice by clicking on dice

3-Click OK button to validate (hidden in the following picture)

4-When you have no dice left or you don't want to play any card, click PASS to pass your turn

5-Try to empty the monster lifebar before yours

6-Restart with STRT button when you or the monster die

!! You cannot select dice before cards !! Tips : your dice can evolve D4->D6->D8->D10
